resources.string:
This program is the sample application provided with project android-serialport-api. The project is free and open source.

More information and bug report on:
http://code.google.com/p/android-serialport-api/

- CÃ©dric
Please configure your serial port first.
You do not have read/write permission to the serial port.
The serial port can not be opened for an unknown reason.
